description.en: 12 gauge ammoboxes are out of stock, and I can't be bothered to go find more myself. There is a reward.
Cal .22 ammoboxes are out of stock. That's it, you have all the info.
.357 ammoboxes are out of stock. Shame. I'll give you something if you change that.
.38 ammoboxes are out of stock, how am I supposed to keep the peace around here? Let's restock.
.44 ammoboxes are out of stock, and I really like .44 ammoboxes. I need some more.
.45 ACP ammoboxes are out of stock, but you can find them anywhere really, you even get a reward.
50AE ammoboxes are out of stock, and you people really like to buy those. Restock is in order.
9mm ammoboxes are out of stock, and throwing rocks is primitive. Loot some and get a prize.
9x39mm ammoboxes are out of stock, so I am actually bothered to ask someone to find some more.
Everyone loves using Block 21. Maybe because it's so cheap. The stock is getting empty, and it needs a refill.
Can't beat the classic M9. Find one and get something in return.
M9 without a flashlight will get you in trouble, I need to sell more or I will start losing customers.
You know what's annoying? Puppets are. Everyone should get acquainted with smashing their heads in, so why not practice a bit? Take a blunt weapon and have fun.
What type of jewelry would a puppet wear? An arrow for each eye seems appropriate. I'm sure you can do it, and I will even pay you.
Those annoying puppets could do with a haircut. Take a sharp weapon and trim them around the neck area, that's modern these days. Have fun!

Ah, yes. The AK-47. I've sold more of them in this shop than all other weapons combined, and the only guy who has ever complained is now a puppet somewhere on the coast. The stock is obviously empty, so I need more.

rewards.en:
$4,500 and 10FP
C2 Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x Compound Bow at $1,000 and 0FP
24x Broadhead Carbon Arrow at $20 and 0FP
1x Military Quiver at $4,000 and 0FP

description.en: A rifle by itself is good, but if you add a scope it's even better. For that purpose, I need to sell rails in my shop, and a RIS Adapter will do wonders. I've always dreamed about being rich.

rewards.en:
$1,200 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x Red Dot Sight at $1,200 and 0FP

description.en: AK-47 has a successor, and it seems to kill stuff just fine. Help the local business and fill the stock so I can actually sell something.

rewards.en:
$2,600 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
3x VHS Magazine at $800
3x AK15 Magazine at $400
3x AK47 Magazine at $500

description.en: When you don't want to get close to your prey, a Kar98 is a nice option. Unfortunately for me, it's a bit old so you can't find one just anywhere. A reward is waiting for anyone who brings one to me.

rewards.en:
$3,700 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x Weapon Ghillie at $1,800 and 0FP

description.en: When someone needs to mow down a horde, they buy an M249. As there are no left in the shop, the number of hordes around the outpost is making me uncomfortable. The reward is ready for anyone who brings me a fresh suply.

rewards.en:
$4,600 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x VHS 2 at $8,000 and 0FP

description.en: Having a cannon for a rifle is cool. It gets even better when you can actually hit something. For that purpose, I need to stock up on some M82 Scopes.

rewards.en:
$2,500 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x ACOG at $1,700 and 0FP

description.en: Mosin Nagant or Kar98? I'm a pro so it doesn't matter to me. I'm all out of Mosins though.

rewards.en:
$3,500 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x Ghillie Suit Top at $2,000 and 0FP
1x Ghillie Suit Bottom at $2,000 and 0FP

description.en: If you go hunting in the dark with no equipment, you're gonna end up being hunted. I keep selling the Goggles, and my customers keep forgetting the batteries, but profit is profit.

rewards.en:
$2,150 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x Bushman at $1,200 and 0FP

description.en: Some of my customers keep returning the M1 Garand saying the cant't hit anything. Most of them also had blue thums. I gave them a discount on M1 Scopes, so now I don't have any left.

rewards.en:
$1,800 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x V3 Holographic Sight at $1,200 and 0FP

description.en: The shop can't be picky about what guns to buy, so I have to clean all of them. It's about time that people learn to clean their weapons.

rewards.en:
$1,700 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x AK15 Suppressor at $1,800 and 0FP

description.en: Every police station has a bunch of surveillance cameras and some satellites on the roofs. I need someone to pull a wire or two so we'll know for sure TEC1 cant't use those against the good people that are my customers.

rewards.en:
$3,000 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x Handgun Suppressor at $1,000 and 30FP

description.en: Like a Western. TEC1 sends puppets at us, send the puppets undergound. Easy. This should be a proper stress relief for anyone who's been here a while. The job is simple, just kill a bunch of them and get a reward. I'm wonderful like that.

It's a hars life here on The Island, but it's not harsh enough for everyone to eat every single poison mushroom found in the woods, I mean seriously?! That makes Charcoal a top-selling product if nothing else, but I need to restock.

When someone gets a cut, it's generally a bad thing. If they are a prisoner on The Island, they are also gonna get an infection. Check the abandoned pharmacies and hospitals and try to fing some Antibiotics for my shop.
TEC1 didn't provide us with toothpaste so sometimes my eyes bleed when patients start talking. Some Disposable mask will help me with that one, so I'll pay if you find any.
I'm not exactly a magician, if someone wants me to fix them up, I need bandages, and lots of them. They have the 'Emergency' in them for a purpose you know.
I have to look the part if nothing else, for starters, I need a Hospital Shirt and Hospital Pants. It will make the patients more confident that I actually know what I'm doing. What can you do?
Sometime it's just better to be safe than sorry. How does anyone expect me to operate on them without proper gloves?! Anyway, I need a few, help me out and I'll pay.

Have you ever had a swollen ankle and then a bear found you? No? Let me tell you, the local bears are feasting out there, that's why you want to have some painkillers with you at all time. I'm all out of them, so I'll pay for them. Check the pharmacies, hospitals, and even bathrooms.

Some of the stronger squads ofte visit the nuclear areas in C0, even against my recommendations. I mean, it's a nuclear area. Anyway, I need to restock on Potassium Iodide so those guys actually have a chance to survive they start shining like Christmas trees. Pharmacies should have some.

Every doctor has a way of doing things, but we're all gonna make you say that 'Ahhh'. We do need something to stick up in your mouth and I'll use whatever sticks you can bring. I carve in my free time so I'll make it work.

It is not really expected that prisoners on this Island will bother with vitamins, but giving the body that extra boost will go a long way in messing up TEC1 and staying safe from other prisoners. I'll wait with the reward.

I am a man of science, but I have reasons to believe local churches have been used to manipulate a lot of local folks, and not in a good way. I will reward anyone who visits a couple of churches and check if there is anything weird with Chalices around the altar.

More people might be saved if I know what TEC1 is doing to them. Locals used to dip in the fountains a lot, so I need someone to check a few of them for any weird stuff hiding in there. They can be found in a lot of places around The Island, but the reward is still decent.

On the topic of murder, I want you to decimate some TEC1 puppets. We need to find out what effects the BCU has on the body, so it's time for a little research party. Your part is to chop a few limbs and bring them to me, I will do the rest. There is a reward, you don't even have to look for the puppets, they will find you.

I never recommend taking different pills together, but why would the world's most famous criminals listen to a doctor? Antibiotics and Painkillers are out of stock, and people have started threatening me, so I'll reward anyone who brings some to the shop. Both can be found around pharmacies, hospitals, and even bathrooms.

rewards.en:
$1,500 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x Isopropyl alcohol at $700 and 0FP

description.en: It beats the heck out of me why one would go near radiation, but when they do, they usually come running in here looking for help. If I don't have Activated Charcoal in my stock, the Armorer guy steps in and handles it very effectively. With a gun. Find some anti-radiation and anti-poison stuff, the reward is waiting.

rewards.en:
$1,500 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
3x Emergency Bandage at $350 and 0FP
1x Emergency Bandage Pack at $1,550 and 0FP

description.en: Over 62.5% of prisoners get their legs messed up at some point. Okay, I just made that up, but you get the point, I need more crutches in stock. They will probably become lethal weapons as well, but I don't mind, I'll still have a reward ready for anyone who finds some.

rewards.en:
$1,450 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
2x Painkillers - Blister at $1,500 and 0FP

name.en: To Bleed Or Not to Bleed

description.en: Wound treatment is always better in the hands of a pro like me. As it stands, I will start to use the wrong equipment when it comes to bleeding because I'm all out of Hemostatic Dressings. As I wait for someone to help out with that, I'll try not to kill too many of my patients. Your best bets are hospitals and pharmacies.

rewards.en:
$1,600 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts.
3x Emergency Bandage at $300 and 0FP

description.en: I never assumed that so many hardcore prisoners would care about how they look, but when they want a change, the come to me. I need full gear for any surgery type of business and that includes shirts, pants, masks, and of cource, gloves to protect my tender hands. I need the whole set, so when you find it, bring it.

rewards.en:
$1,450 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
3x Emergency Bandage at $300 and 0FP
1x Antibiotics - Blister - 1000mg at $1,500 and 0FP
1x Potassium Iodide Pills - Blister at $250 and 0FP

description.en: Being in a gunfight is as much pressure as when I have to do plastic surgery on a serial killer, but having some Pressure Dressings at hand helps calm the nerves. The only thing is, I have none, so I'm panicking a bit here. Go through the pharmacies and hospitals, bring me some, and I'll dish out a reward

rewards.en:
$1,520 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
3x Hermostatic Dressing at $650 and 0FP

description.en: I've seen a lot of weird eating habits, but chugging vitamins is not as helpfull as one might think. I recommend a daily dose to everyone who buys them, but why listen to a pro? The shop doesn't have any vitamins left, so I need a bunch. They can be found at all the usual medical places, so find some and come for the reward.

rewards.en:
$1,500 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x Isopropyl alcohol at $700 and 0FP

description.en: I don't like it as much as anyone, but in the name of science and, survival I need someone to check a few graveyards for sign of anything weird. Maybe there is more to those puppets than we know. Or maybe I will pay you fot nothing. You get the reward in any case.

requirements.en: Check graves for signs of abnormalities

rewards.en:
$2,000 and 15FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
3x Classics Cigarettes Pack at $100 and 0FP

description.en: Life on The Island can get scary at night, and I'm fresh out of batteries, even the little ones.

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

description.en: It is not my concern that people make Lockpicks out of Bobby Pins, but the demand is high!

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

description.en: Even prisoners want a candy from time to time and my stock is empty. Find some Chocolate Candy and bring it to my shop.

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

description.en: Crafting things from houses to explosives always requires a bit of Duct Tape, and I'm all out.

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

description.en: Not really sure what my customers use all that glue for, but who am I to question it. I need some help to refill my stock.

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

description.en: All of our sharp tools are not really that sharp, so they can't be sold. A Grinding Stone will solve that problem.

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

description.en: One can never have enough needles, but good luck finding them!

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

description.en: Patched clothes are better than no clothes and they, unfortunately, can't be patched without a proper Sewing Kit.

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

name.en: I Need of Sexy and Short

description.en: Some things never go out of fashion. Bring some Sexy Shorts and I'll pay you.

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

description.en: Things break. Some things need to be fixed. Even a Small Toolbox can do the job with the right technique.

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

description.en: Hygiene is important, even in this wretched place. Find some soaps for me, just dont't drop one, The Island is full of prisoners after all.

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

description.en: It is hard to be a trader in this nasty place, but I do my best. If someone could just sabotage a few air conditioners here and there, I could sell more drinks at my place. Nobody likes being hot, right?

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

description.en: You never know who's listening, so better make sure no one is. There are telephone booths all over The Island, and I will pay for someone to do a security check on each one in case they are bugged.

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

description.en: It's not exactly a tool, but we have to follow the trends around here.

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

rewards.en:
$1,600 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
3x Tool Box at $800 and 0FP

description.en: Drill is essential for building anything durable, but it is not always easy to get them. There a few old building sites around, but they are too dangerous for me. That's why the pay is good!

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

description.en: Everything looks better with a coat of fresh new paint, and some prisoners are real artist. Even if you prefer black and white, bring some paint and get rewarded.

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

rewards.en:
$1,600 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
10x Soap at $50 and 0FP

description.en: Every pickaxe is a trusty tool, even if not made of diamonds, and the're out of stock.

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

rewards.en:
$1,600 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x Small Spade at $100 and 0FP

description.en: The Island can be a lonely place, but not if you have a radio. Be careful when bringing it, if turner on, it could make you a target.

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

rewards.en:
$1,400 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
3x Smartphone Battery at $400 and 0FP

description.en: A heavy duty tool indeed, but a true engineer will handle it with care.

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

rewards.en:
$1,500 and 10FP
%sector% Traders Shop Discounts:
1x Metal Detector at $3,000 and 0FP

description.en: There is not a lot that can keep you going as Red Ghoul can. Just be careful to avoid Kix, he will steal it and drink it.

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

rewards.en:
$1,600 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
3x Canteen at $200 and 0FP

description.en: Hiking Backpacks can fit so much loot that there just isn't much sense in not having them. They sell realy good, so the store could always use some.

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

rewards.en:
$2,200 and 20FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x Bedroll at $700 and 0FP

description.en: My business is all about details, I can't sell my merchandise without knowing the market. There are files around all of the offices and business buildings on The Island, and there is so much information there that I just can't pass it up. I just need someone to find the files and let me know the locations, I will do the rest!

requirements.en: Locate files and folders around The Island

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

rewards.en:
$1,700 and 15FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x Drill at $1,500 and 0FP

description.en: People of the past used fax machines a lot. TEC01 might be digging around those and using the information to fortify their positions and maybe even listen in to any of the prisoners who still know how to use them. I know there is one at B0 Junkyard and at least one more in Z1 Trainyard. I will pay for erasing the data on them!

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

rewards.en:
$1,700 and 15FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x Rebar Cutter at $2,000 and 0FP

description.en: It is crucial that we keep good communication around The Island, it will help us survive these TEC01 games they like to play with us. B2 airfield is crucial, so I need someone to do a maintenance check there. It isn‚Äôt complicated to find, but the place is full of sentries so I‚Äôll pay well.

requirements_1.en: Perform a maintenance check on the airfield generator.

requirements_2.en: Perform a maintenance check on the satellite dish.

translate_data.completion_text: TURN IN TO %sector% GENERAL GOODS TRADER

rewards.en:
$8,000 and 40FP
%sector% Traders Shop Discounts:
1x Base Expansion Kit Lvl1 at15,000 and 90FP

description.en: Every punk that gets dropped here thinks that flying is easy. None of them can explain why I'm always out of Aeroplane Repair Kits! Visit an airfield or two and fetch some, I've got a prize waiting.

It's a TV show, but some are trying to win a bit too hard. That's why I always check everyone's Brake Oil, I can't afford to lose customers. Check garages and gas stations, bring some, and get rewarded.

Running out of power is a bad, BAD thing, and somehow my Car Battery Cables stock is as empty as a bottle of whiskey! They are everywhere, houses, garages, even gas stations. Help me out and I'll give you a prize.
Sometime my customers have to fix their vehicles a bit before they come for the REAL repair here at my place, so Car Jacks sell like crazy. Sweep a garage or two and I reward you.
I love car people, why trouble me if they can trouble themselves, right? Fetch some Car Repair Kits while I rest, can't expect me to work all day, cant't you?

The Island ain't that small, and people hoard whatever little gas is left, so having a Small Gasoline Canister can come in handy. Shame I don't have any at my shop, but how about you change that? I'll reward you, don't worry.
I can't patch all those bullet holes on your vehicles without some spare Metal Scraps. Shouldn't be hard to find, check Junkyard and old car wrecks and bring me a batch.

When you put a lot of angry scum on the same island, Oil Filters mostly get used for making suppressors. I dont really care as long as I can sell them, but the current stock size is zero. Check around wrecked cars and I‚Äôll pay you.
I hate when tools get used to smash heads, but what can you do? I do sometimes use them to fix vehicles. My Wrench Pipe stock is running empty so fetch some for me, I'll wait with the reward.
If I can't watch TV, nobody can! I want you to make sure that all those little old TVs can't be used. But be subtle so they have to figure it out.

name.en: One Battery To Rule Them All

description.en: Cars are useless without a battery, so you better help out and bring me one. I'm not gonna beg, a reward is ready so go, tear through the houses, gas stations, and garages. Just don't be an asshole and bring me an empty one.

rewards.en:
$1,600 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x Car Jack at $1,500 and 0FP

description.en: I'm a sucker for Dirtbikes, but it seems that everyone else is too. I need a Dirtbike Body for a personal project, but my stock is empty. There are not a lot of them, but I'll take any kind. You'll have most luck around garagesm but people drop them everywhere so keep you eyes open.

rewards.en:
$1,550 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x Car Repair Kit at $1,200 and 0FP

description.en: You know that feeling when someone brake checks you and you want to mash their head in with a Wrench Pipe? It's even less fun if they don't have a brake light installed, and they cant't have it if my stock is empty! I'll pay, so bring me some.

rewards.en:
$1,200 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x Dirtbike Front Wheel Cover at $150 and 0FP

description.en: A lot of punks keep saying ''It's always raining on The Island, my clothes are wet, boo-hoo'', well imagine them riding a Dirbike through the woods without a Fender. Find some for me so I can make money on them. You'll make some too, don't worry.

rewards.en:
$1,450 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x Dirtbike Headlights at $150 and 0FP

description.en: It's not smart going into a gunfight on a Dirtbike, but it sure is fun. People buy the Front Shield as a placebo, but I don't mind them clearing my stock. Speaking of that, the stock is empty so I'll reward anyone who finds a Front Shield and brings it to the shop.

rewards.en:
$1,480 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x Dirtbike Hellride Skull at $200 and 0FP

description.en: My Dirtbike project is on hold because guess what, driving it at night is suicide. Driving it at night without Headlights is even worse. Since I can't continue without them, you better find me some. If I would go search for it I would start at garages, gas statons, and maybe even the motocross track in the Z3 Sector. I'll be waiting with the reward.

rewards.en:
$1,580 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x Dirtbike Front Shield at $200 and 0FP

description.en: Nobody is interesting enough for me to give a damn, but when a horned Dirtbike goes right at ya, you start to feel stuff. Check the garages, check the Junkyard in the B0 sector, and bring me a Hellride Skull, I promise I'll be gererous.

rewards.en:
$1,580 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x Dirbike Fender at $200 and 0FP

description.en: Finding the right wheels for the Dirtbike is a piece of work, that's why I pay for it, can't be bothered to look by myself. I need both the frint and the back one, so tear down the Junkyard in B0 and the nearby garages. I'll pay big bucks for this one.

rewards.en:
$1,400 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x Dirtbike Hellride Body at $1,000 and 0FP
1x Dirtbike Body at $1,000 and 0FP

description.en: Let's not mess around, gasoline cant't be found just anywhere and everyone knows that, but it's a real survival tool. If a person is serious about surviving, they need gas and a lot of it. The problem is storing it. That's wy I need a Gasoline Canister. You find it, I'll pay for it.

rewards.en:
$1,500 and 5FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
2x Small Gasoline Canister at $150 and 0FP

description.en: Punks who can't drive keep destroying whole bikes along with the batteries and everything so guess what, I need Motorbike Batteries, and I need them yesterday. There's a prize in it for you.

rewards.en:
$1,600 and 10FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x Small Vehicle Storage Rack at $1,000 and 0FP

description.en: Everyone thinks the're smart by using old construction generators. Well, do a little 'touch-up' on a few of them. Why? Why not, I'll even pay.

rewards.en:
$2,000 and 20FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
1x Car Jack at $1,000 and 0FP

description.en: I heard some punks think I'm expensive. Well, I don't care! Do a little sabotaging so everyone needs to come here. You will find Car Lifts in all local car workshops.

rewards.en:
$2,000 and 20FP
%sector% Trader's Shop Discounts:
2x Car Repair Kit at $800 and 0FP
